HEADLINE: Pursuant to Regulation 46(2)(oa) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform that the Transcript of the Analysts / Institutional Investors Meet, which was held on Tuesday, 15th November, 2022, through the electronic medium of video conferencing (Zoom Platform), is attached herewith
